hype: Send one voice note hyping a friend for something real they did.
Shake out your body for 20 seconds, then hit one avoided task.
Play your favourite hype track and move for the whole first hook.
Write down one win from this week and screenshot it as a reminder.
Message someone you rate and tell them one specific thing they do well.
Stand up, roll your shoulders, breathe deep 5 times and commit to a single move.
focus: Close every tab except the one that actually moves you forward.
Write the next 3 moves you need to make. Do just the first.
Mute one noisy app for the next hour.
Pick something you can finish in 5 minutes and clear it now.
Rename one messy folder or file so Future You can find it.
Delete 5 pointless notifications or emails without reading them.
drift: Step outside for 3 minutes and only notice sound, light and air.
Put your phone face down for one full song.
Breathe in 4, hold 4, out 6 — repeat 6 times.
Choose one thought you don’t need tonight and let it pass without chasing.
Dim the lights a little and take 6 slow breaths before you touch your screen again.
Lie back, close your eyes and listen to the room for 60 seconds with no judgement.
